PSCT.Base: During the Main Phase, if you control "Mementoal Tecuhtlica - Combined Creation" (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; for the rest of this turn, your opponent cannot target "Memento" monsters you control with card effects. During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 "Memento" monster you control, and if you do, send up to 2 "Memento" cards with different names from each other from your Deck to the GY, except "Mementotlan Goblin". You can only use each effect of "Mementotlan Goblin" once per turn.
